void MouseCursor::activate (  )  [virtual]

Activates the mouse cursor.

This method is called automaticaly by App when the scripts set the mouse cursor as the active cursor. Normally, there should be no need to call it directly.

Reimplemented from InputCursor.

void MouseCursor::automaticCursorManagement ( bool  state  ) 

Sets the isAutomaticCursorManagement_ flag.

When true, the mouse will be managed by the client

bool MouseCursor::automaticCursorManagement (  )  const

Returns current setting as to whether the mouse cursor is automatically managed by the client.

static bool MouseCursor::Check ( PyObject *  pObject  )  [inline, static]

Reimplemented from InputCursor.

void MouseCursor::clipped ( bool  state  ) 

Sets the clip flag.

When true, the mouse will be clipped to the region of the window while it is in focus.

bool MouseCursor::clipped (  )  const

Returns current setting as to whether the mouse cursor is clipped while window is in focus.

void MouseCursor::deactivate (  )  [virtual]

Deactivates the mouse cursor.

This method is called automaticaly by App when the scripts unset the mouse cursor as the active cursor. Normally, there should be no need to call it directly.

Reimplemented from InputCursor.

void MouseCursor::dynamic ( bool  dynamic  ) 

Sets the dynamicity status of the mouse cursor (only meaningful if a dynamic TextureProvider is being used as mouse pointer.

Setting it to true will force the mouse pointer texture to be updated every frame.

bool MouseCursor::dynamic (  )  const

Retrieves the current dynamicity status of the mouse cursor.

void MouseCursor::focus ( bool  focus  )  [virtual]

Informs the MouseCursor class about changes in the application focus state.

Parameters:
focus new application focus state.

Reimplemented from InputCursor.

bool MouseCursor::handleAxisEvent ( const AxisEvent &   )  [virtual]

Handle axis events.

The mouse cursor does nothing with them.

The mouse cursor does nothing with them.

void MouseCursor::shape ( const std::string &  cursorName  ) 

Sets a new shape for the mouse cursor.

Parameters:
cursorName name of the cursor to use (as defined in mouse_cursors.xml)

const std::string & MouseCursor::shape (  )  const

Returns current mouse cursor shape.

void MouseCursor::staticSetFocus ( bool  focus  )  [static]

Informs the MouseCursor class about changes in the application focus state.

This function is called even when the mcursor is not the active InputCursor so that we can do low-level house keeping chores related to the mouse.

Parameters:
focus new application focus state.

static void MouseCursor::Super_addDirInfo (  )  [inline, static]

Reimplemented from InputCursor.

void MouseCursor::tick ( float  dTime  ) 

Ticks the mouse cursor.

Parameters:
dTime time elapsed in between frames.

void MouseCursor::updateMouseClipping (  )  [static]

Does a per-frame update of the mouse clipping.

It is done per frame rather than just clipping/unclipping in setFocus because it allows nicer behaviour when refocusing the window with the mouse while the cursor is clicked.

void MouseCursor::visible ( bool  state  ) 

Sets the visibility status of the mouse cursor.

bool MouseCursor::visible (  )  const

Returns current visibility status of the mouse cursor.
